DataElement.preferredName: Measurable Disease Enhancing Lesion Present Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether enhancing measureable disease is present.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to enhancing (a well-demarcated area of unequivocally increased signal intensity on T1-weighted spin-echo images compared with normal-appearing, surrounding tissue) measurable disease being present.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Capable of being measured.:A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: An enhancing lesion is a well-demarcated area of unequivocally increased signal intensity on T1-weighted spin-echo (SE) images compared with normal-appearing, surrounding tissue following intravenous injection of a gadolinium chelate. (from http://cni.bwh.harvard.edu/projects/gdc/gdc_MRcriteria.html):Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A well-defined area of unequivocally increased signal intensity on MRI or CT scan images compared with the normal-appearing surrounding tissues, following intravenous injection of gadolinium-based contrast material.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
